metadata.Author: Adam Conn
metadata.Readme:
NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.0 rev. 150226 ------------------------------------------------------------- Date: 26-Feb-2015 ------------------------------------------------------------- This package installs a NuGet server on your Sitecore server. It allows NuGet packages to be configured using a Sitecore config file.
------------------------------------------------------------- Installation and configuration instructions are available at https://github.com/adamconn/sitecore-nuget-server
*** NOTE *** Please read the installation instructions BEFORE installing this package. The installation WILL FAIL if you try to install the package without making a change to web.config first.
------------------------------------------------------------- NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.0 runs on: - Sitecore XP 8.0
*** NOTE *** This module should run on any version of Sitecore that meets the requirements for the NuGet.Server package. For more information see https://www.nuget.org/packages/NuGet.Server
------------------------------------------------------------- NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.0 has been tested on: - Sitecore XP 8.0 ------------------------------------------------------------- Sitecore® is a registered trademark. All other brand and product names are the property of their respective holders. The contents of this document are the property of Sitecore. Copyright © 2001-2015 Sitecore. All rights reserved.
